properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Little River Inlet to Murrells Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Murrells Inlet to South Santee River SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Cape Fear NC to Little River Inlet SC out 20 nm; Coastal waters from Surf City to Cape Fear NC out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 6:37PM EST until February 8 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington NC
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Low Water Advisory, abnormally low water levels
expected. For the Small Craft Advisory, west winds 15 to 25 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 6 to 9 ft expected.

* WHERE...Southeast North Carolina and Northeast South Carolina
coastal waters.

* WHEN...For the Low Water Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to
2 AM EST Saturday. For the Small Craft Advisory, until 7 AM
EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft. Below
normal water levels will result in hazardous navigating
conditions.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

Mariners should navigate shallow waters with extreme caution due
to below normal water levels.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY... ...LOW WATER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 2 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 7 PM EST THIS EVENING
